entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Montmagny
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:36 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Pocatière 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
Temperature: -3.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 46 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -13.6°C
Wind: NNE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets or snow. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to ice pellets this evening then to freezing rain after midnight. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or freezing rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to periods of rain or drizzle in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
